nodes.text: Surabat was a tiny settlement on the Outer Rim planet Batuu. Many of its citizens traveled an hour away by transport to work in Black Spire Outpost.

Surabat was created as part of the backstory for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, a theme park land that opened to guests on May 31, 2019 at Disneyland Park, and August 29, 2019 at Disney's Hollywood Studios, Walt Disney World.
